## How do I get this logo?

You can either:

* Install it using:

  * [`npm`][npm]: `npm install --save-dev @browser-logos/brave-nightly`
  * [`Yarn`][yarn]: `yarn add --dev @browser-logos/brave-nightly`

* Use [`cdnjs`][cdnjs].

<!-- Link labels: -->

[cdnjs]: https://cdnjs.com/libraries/browser-logos
[npm]: https://www.npmjs.com/
[yarn]: https://yarnpkg.com/
